divs: Sighting Detailswhile on duty as a security officer at app 4.20 am I was patrolling the site where I was employed.i had my camcorder with me because the night before I had noticed strange lights in the sky.i was looking north east when I observer a strange object heading in my direction I took my camcorder and started to record it .it was making no sound I first taught it was a helicopter in the distance as it got closer no sound then as it neared it suddenly went straight up and vanished in a matter of seconds .there was like a trail on the edges not like what an aeroplane would leave contrail it was different .I know of nothing that could have moved like this I felt it was not manmade.it travelled right twords me and then shot straight up. regards.
Summary: red globe in middle no sound.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Dundalk
This sighting has never been favorited.
